text: Connie Stevens (born Concetta Rosalie Ann Ingolia; August 8, 1938) is an American recording artist, singer and actress. She acted in the television series Hawaiian Eye. She was also in the sitcom Wendy and Me with George Burns. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:Singers from New York City Category:Musicians from New York City Category:1938 births Category:Living people
title: Connie Stevens
